plugins.name: Visible Property 2
plugins.description:
Visible Property 2 will help you creating documentation for hand off. It will update label following reference's component whenever you call the plugin.


Video Tutorial


https://youtu.be/NoihOB1Z6qM


✨ Quick start:


Select "Generate All Color Styles" in plugin menu. Plugin will create Pantone for all of your Color styles


🐷 How it works:


  1. Define reference element by adding "#" in front of a layer name. For example, "#color"
  2. Defile text element you want to update (#reference + . + method). For example, "#color.fill", "#color.fillRGB", "#color.height" etc.
  3. Call the plugin by typing "cmd + /" -> "visible property 2"


🐯 Tips


You can refer to the parent layer by using "##Parent" or "##TopParent" without inserting a layer name.

For example,

  • ##Parent.name or ##Parent.fill
  • ##TopParent.name or ##TopParent.fill


🦁 Properties:


Fill

  • fill -> #123456 78%
  • fillRGB -> rgba(123, 456, 789, 1)
  • fillHSL -> hsla(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • fillHSB -> hsba(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • fillStyle -> DarkBlue
  • fillStyleDescription -> The Description


Stroke

  • stroke -> #123456
  • strokeRGB -> rgba(123, 456, 789, 1)
  • strokeHSL -> hsla(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • strokeHSB -> hsba(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • strokeStyle -> DarkBlue
  • strokeStyleDescription -> The Description


Text

  • font -> Roboto
  • fontWeight -> Bold
  • fontSize -> 12
  • paragraphIndent -> 12
  • paragraphSpace -> 12
  • letterSpace -> 12 or 12%
  • lineHeight -> 12 or 12%
  • textStyle -> Body
  • textStyleDescription -> The Description


Size

  • height -> 32
  • width -> 64


Layer

  • name -> layer name


Component

  • description -> component description


Note: This plugin only supports gradients with default Start/Stop positions


☕️ Love this plugin: buy me a coffee


This plugin is an open-source on github
plugins.tagline: Plugin will help you update text follow component property.

plugins.name: Sync variables
plugins.description:
Import/export your Figma variables to as simple as CSS variables.

Would love to hear your feedback.


Supported Features

  1. Mode: Facilitates theme variation with -dark suffixed variables.
  2. All variable types are supported: color, string, number, boolean
  3. Update Matching Collections: Prevents duplicate collections by updating existing ones.
  4. Alias Support: Maintains Figma aliases in import/export process(as a CSS variable).
  5. Length unit supported: px and rem length units are supported.
  6. Description supported in both import and export


Export Functionality

  1. Exports CSS variables from any collections or modes
  2. Numbers format supported: px, rem
  3. Color format supported: rgba, hex, hsl
  4. Alias are preserved
  5. Prefix and postfix option available.


Import Functionality

  1. Import variables in either new collection or update an existing collection.
  2. Associates Figma aliases with their CSS variables var(--variable), ensuring consistency across the design system.
  3. All variables are supported


A simple CSS file variables work for import

:root {
--color-bg-dark: hsl(0, 69%, 67%);
--color-bg-brand-dark: #0c8ce9;
--color-bg-brand-hover-dark: #0a6dc2;
--color-bg-component-dark: #8a38f5;
--color-bg-component-hover-dark: #7a2ed6;
}


This Figma plugin enhances the design-to-development workflow, ensuring a cohesive and efficient transfer of design tokens from Figma to CSS, and is an invaluable asset for managing large-scale design systems or theme variations like light and dark modes.


Powered by yupma.com

accepted.name: Yupma
accepted.description: Simplify design systems!

plugins.tagline: Import/Export your figma variables to simple CSS variables

plugins.name: Chaos Pattern
plugins.description:
Save time placing items in a grid pattern with random offsets, sizes and rotations, all of which can be fully customized.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more items, then click "Set" to use them as the pattern.
  2. Choose a frame or slide (Figma Slides) to apply the pattern.
  3. Click "Generate."
  4. Adjust the sliders to find the best settings.


Structure Settings

  1. Hexagon Grid: The horizontal position of every other row will be offset.
  2. Square Grid: Evenly spaced rows and columns.
  3. Circular Grid: Place items on a circular path.
  4. Spacing: distance between adjacent items.


Random Settings

Each slider represents how chaotic it is. 1 means very chaotic.

  1. Start Position: where the first item will start. 1 means random position of [-spacing, spacing] will be added.
  2. Rotation: how far each item can randomly rotate. 0.25 means between -45º and 45º, while 1 allows full rotation between -180º to 180º.
  3. Grid Offset: how far from their original grid position the items can randomly spawn. 0 means the items are locked to the grid.
  4. Transparency: the level of opacity to apply. 0 means no change. 0.25 means applying a random opacity between 0.75 and 1.
  5. Scale: how much scale factor should be randomly applied. 0.5 means the scale will be randomly chosen between 0.5x to 1x.


Pricing

  1. 5 free uses with full access to all features.
  2. Unlock unlimited access and future updates for a one-time purchase.


Tips

When you generate items multiple times on the same frame, the plugin recognizes which items it created and will automatically remove them for you. If you'd prefer to keep previously generated items, consider grouping them before generating new ones.


Credits

  1. Preview Bubble screen by Татьяна Крупина
  2. Preview Animal screen by dini.matu
  3. Preview Tree screen by The Visual Team

accepted.name: Saranomy
accepted.description: I make premium Figma Plugins

plugins.tagline: Place items on a grid with random offsets, sizes and rotations!

plugins.name: Translate.photo - Translate your Figma Designs
plugins.description:
Hey developers, designers, translators, and product manager, Ready to Go Global with a Click?


Introducing Translate.photo - Elevate your Figma journey with Translate.photo, the game-changing plugin set to transform how you conquer language barriers in your creative ventures. Seamlessly translate text within your frames into more than 75 languages with just a simple click.


Bid farewell to the tedious process of external translation and clunky copy-pasting – welcome to a smoother, more efficient workflow that lets your creativity shine without limits!


Translate.photo breaks down language barriers and supercharge your design process. Imagine creating digital products that speak to the world, without the back-and-forth emails or endless meetings.


Sounds like a dream? Well, it's about to get real!


How Translate.photo + Figma = Magic


  1. Free Plugin: Snap the Translate.photo plugin into your Figma, you're on your way to translate your figma files.
  2. Pick 'n' Click: Got a design that needs to be translated in different language? Just select document, frame, or layer you wish to translate.
  3. 75+Language : You can choose from 75+language and proceed to translate by clicking the designated button.
  4. Automatic Text Replacement: Experience the seamless transition as Translate.photo automatically replaces all text layers within the chosen frame with the selected language, your design in multiple languages without manual translation efforts.
  5. Linguistic Expert: Want to make sure that translated content is just perfect? Translate.photo plugin offers content proofreading by language Experts.


Get access to 1000's of language and subject matter experts in 75 languages in click of a button.


Why You'll Love It


  1. Saves Time: Skip the hassle of manual translations.
  2. Ensures Accuracy: Get the option for expert proofreading.
  3. Direct In-App Translation: Conveniently translate text inside Illustrator to 75+ languages.
  4. Maintain Design Integrity: Keep your original design layout intact.
  5. Streamlined Workflow: Ideal for designers handling multilingual projects.
  6. Teams : Add your language experts, language approvers at 1 place


And here's the cherry on top: Dive in with a 500-word free trial and see how Translate.photo can transform your Figma workflow. Going global has never been this easy, or this fun!


Ready to take your designs around the world? Let's make it happen with Translate.photo
plugins.tagline: Translate your Figma Designs to 75+ Languages with 1 Click.

plugins.name: QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Introducing the QR Code Generator Figma plugin, your go-to tool for effortlessly creating customizable QR codes directly within your Figma designs. This user-friendly plugin empowers designers to generate QR codes with ease, offering a range of customization options to suit your project's unique aesthetic.

Enjoying my free Figma plugin? ☕ Consider buying me a coffee to fuel future development!


Key Features:

  • Color Customization: Tailor the QR code colors to match your design palette. Choose from a spectrum of hues for foreground and background elements.
  • Logo Integration: Elevate your QR codes by seamlessly integrating your brand logo. Ensure a consistent and professional look across all your visual assets.
  • Text Customization: Add a title and subtitle to your QR code to provide context and enhance user engagement. Customize the font, size, and color to align with your design specifications.
  • Multiple formats: The QR Code Generator supports multiple export formats, including PNG, SVG, and JPEG. Easily incorporate your QR codes into various design projects and digital platforms.


Why Choose QR Code Generator:

  • Efficiency: Save time by creating QR codes directly in Figma, eliminating the need for external tools or software.
  • Flexibility: Adapt QR codes to your brand guidelines with flexible customization options for colors, logos, and text.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Streamlined controls and a user-friendly interface make QR code generation accessible to both beginners and experienced designers.

plugins.name: Instancer - Bulk generate instances from a component
plugins.description:
Instancer - Bulk generate instances from a component


Transform any Figma component/Instance/ComponentSet into a comprehensive Table showing every possible variant combination. Instancer allows you to Explore all your component states in one clear, labeled layout.


Features :


  1. Auto-Generate All Variants - Creates every possible component combination instantly
  2. Smart Property Controls - Choose which properties to include or exclude from generation
  3. Live Combination Counter - See total possible variants and nested instances at a glance
  4. Toggle-Based Filtering - Use switches to turn properties on/off for precise control
  5. Organized Matrix Layout - Clean grid arrangement makes all combinations easy to scan
  6. Clear Instance Labels - Every variant shows exactly which properties are active
  7. One-Click Generation - Select any component and generate complete variant overview instantly


Its a one-stop pit stop for reviewing design system completeness and consistency.


How to use instancer :


  1. Select any component/instance/variant from your Figma file
  2. Plugin preview window displays the selected component and shows all available properties and variants
  3. Use toggle controls to choose which properties to include in generation
  4. Click "Generate" to create your possible combination
  5. Voilà! All possible combinations are instantly created in an organized, labeled layout.


Pricing :


Free : Up to 10 free generations to explore and test the plugin.

Premium : Unlimited generations at a price of coffee.

accepted.name: Briston
accepted.description: Designer | Student | webflow

plugins.tagline: Generate all your component possibilities with ease

plugins.name: 24Stream
plugins.description:
24Stream plugin helps to create rich-content for product cards, which is intended to be broadcasted to online sellers and marketplaces.

The plugin allows you to unify the layout and then automatically make the layout design in HTML, as well as to package in the E-package format - which is designed to exchange rich content between online sellers and marketplaces.

With the help of the plugin you can choose an existing design of the features, integrate it into your layout, make all necessary changes using the entire arsenal of Figma to work on layouts or create your own collection on the site with 24streamConverter and use it.

To convert your design to layout, you need to go to 24StreamConverter website, log in to your personal account via Figma and choose the necessary layout for conversion.

To access the plugin, you need to enter the key that you can get by writing to klimov@24ttl.ru.

plugins.description:
The Figma Free Multi-Language Translation Plugin is your ultimate design companion for effortlessly breaking language barriers. This powerful, free plugin supports translation in over a dozen languages, including Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, and more, ensuring your design projects effectively communicate with global audiences. With high-quality, fast translation capabilities, you can transform your text with just a single click, streamlining your workflow and enhancing productivity.


Say goodbye to complicated processes and embrace simplicity with a user-friendly interface designed for seamless operation. Whether you're working on international projects or collaborating with a multicultural team, this plugin is the perfect tool to ensure your designs speak every language.


We invite everyone to experience the convenience and efficiency of this free plugin. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we welcome any questions or suggestions for further optimization. Let’s make design truly universal together!

plugins.name: Use Design Tokens
plugins.description:
⚠️ Available only to early-access users during beta period.


useDesignTokens is a powerful tool for managing your design tokens in a more organized and consistent way. With its easy-to-use interface and powerful features, it allows you to create, organize, and customize your design tokens with ease.


  • Multi-branding: manage design tokens for multiple brands within a single project.


  • Contextual overrides (themes): define contextual overrides for color modes, high contrast modes, density, localization, responsiveness, and more.


  • Token tiers and alias tokens: You can create token tiers, allowing you to split your design tokens into different levels of hierarchy. You can also create alias tokens that reference tokens in other tiers, allowing you to keep your tokens organized and consistent.


  • Alias transforms let you apply transforming rules to the referenced token's value.


  • Composite tokens: Create custom token types by grouping together other tokens


  • Tree structure: organize your design tokens in a tree-like structure, making it easy to navigate and find the tokens you need.


  • Page and frame contexts: apply different contexts for each page or each frame in a page, allowing for greater flexibility and customization.


  • Import and export: useDesignTokens supports the W3C design tokens specification and allows you import and export your tokens in JSON format. 


  • Sync with Figma native styles, GitHub and Gitlab repositories.


  • Team collaboration: everyone in the team can work simultaneously on the same tokens system and see everyone's changes instantly.


Visit usedesigntokens.com for more information.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your design system with contextual and multi-brand design tokens

usage

plugins.name: Handoff
plugins.description:
Handoff is a set of open-source, end-to-end workflow tools for design and development teams looking to streamline their use of Figma design systems.


The Handoff Figma plugin makes it easy to extract tokens from your components. Use it to annotate your design system, marking components that are ready to be used. Pick which attributes should be extracted from each component layer. Preview foundational and component design tokens in CSS and configure how they are named.


Once your design file is ready, you can export all the tokens and generate a static design documentation site by leveraging Handoff CLI.


Check out the Quick Start Guide.


Find out more.

plugins.name: Color picker - Find your perfect shade. Core: Color made simple, made brilliant.
plugins.description:
Light & Wavelengths: Colors are not inherent properties of objects. They arise from the interaction of light and our eyes. Light itself is a form of electromagnetic radiation, and within the visible spectrum (the spectrum we can see), different wavelengths create different color sensations. For example, red has longer wavelengths, while blue has shorter ones.

Eye & Perception: Our eyes have cone cells that respond to different wavelengths, triggering the perception of color. Most humans have three types of cone cells, making us "trichromats." Some individuals have variations in cone cells, leading to color blindness.

plugins.name: Asphalt - Color Grading (based on USWDS)
plugins.description:
Use this plugin to check the grade point for any color using its HEX value. It can also be used to get a list of suggested colors for a desired grade point.


How to use:

  • Input the HEX codes for the Foreground color.
  • Pick the desired grade you want a suggested shade in (optional)
  • Hit "Generate"


⚠️ For dark mode tokens, choose the desired grade in reverse, not from 0 but from 100. For example, the desired grade is 30 in light mode. It is five levels from 0. For dark mode, choose the fifth level from 100, which is 60.


This is based on the USWDS system of grading colors. With the help of 'magic numbers', you can use this system to ensure an accessible palette.


For any queries/feedback/suggestions feel free to leave a comment and we'll be happy to connect! 🚀

⚠️ For dark mode tokens, choose the desired grade in reverse, not from 0 but from 100. For example, the desired grade is 30 in light mode. It is five levels from 0. For dark mode, choose the fifth level from 100, which is 60.


This is based on the USWDS system of grading colors. With the help of 'magic numbers', you can use this system to ensure an accessible palette.


For any queries/feedback/suggestions feel free to leave a comment and we'll be happy to connect! 🚀
47519.tagline: Grade any color with ease while being WCAG compliant!

plugins.name: XAuto
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Presets:


  • Horizontal
  • Vertical
  • Stretch Horizontal
  • Stretch Vertical
  • Space Between Horizontal
  • Space Between Vertical
  • Toggle Direction


All presets are available as plugin parameters and individual menu items so you can create shortcuts that suit you.


Frame Alignment


Change your frame alignment quick as a flash by assigning custom short cuts rather than using the standard Figma UI.


If you have a full size keyboard try assigning Cmd + Option and the numbers on the numpad.


Padding and Spacing Panel


Try assigning a shortcut like `Ctrl + Shift + A` to quickly access frame padding and spacing options.


How To Use Presets


  1. Select the items you want to apply a preset to. If the items are not already in a frame, XAuto will create a parent frame for you.
  2. Apply preset via the plugin parameters or menu
  3. Profit


Playground


After installing the XAuto plugin I highly recommend downloading the XAuto Playground community file and try it out.

plugins.name: Artwork Flow Brand Assistant
plugins.description:
About Artwork Flow

Artwork Flow is an intelligent creative operations platform that allows designers, marketing teams, and brands to create, store, manage, and publish data-backed creatives at scale within minutes. Using Artwork Flow, businesses can maximize their campaign ROI with accelerated creative production, streamlined tasks and workflows, actionable creative insights, an intuitive asset library, and automated brand compliance.


Why choose Artwork Flow’s Brand Assistant on Figma?

Artwork Flow allows brands to store their brand guidelines, elements, and other assets on a smart digital asset management system while helping users streamline their creative operations with flexible workflows.

With Artwork Flow’s Brand Assistant, you can import any assets stored on Artwork Flow, including images and brand assets like logos, colours, and fonts. You can also complete any pending upload tasks on Artwork Flow by uploading assets directly from Figma.


To get started with Artwork Flow:

  1. Sign up for Artwork Flow: https://bit.ly/AFxFigma
  2. Upload your brand guidelines and assets to Artwork Flow.
  3. Install Brand Assistant on Figma and simplify your creative operations.

plugins.name: AI Dev for Ant Design
plugins.description:
Generate Ant Design React code for your Figma components in seconds

AI Dev for Ant Design is a Figma plugin that transforms your Figma components or images into ready-to-use Ant Design React code.


Learn more on our website


How It Works

1. Select a simple component in your Figma file.

2. Optionally, provide additional context about the component. For example: "Dropdown menu should include items: View, Edit, Delete."

3. Click "Generate React Code".

4. Copy the generated code to your clipboard.

5. Paste the code into your React project.


Optimizing Components for Best Results

As the plugin is in beta, you may encounter occasional bugs or discrepancies. Follow these tips to achieve optimal results:

1. Break down complex UIs: Instead of processing entire app screens, generate code for individual UI sections (e.g., header, content area cards, table, charts) separately.

2. Provide detailed context: Include extra details when necessary. For instance, specify the items to be included in a dropdown menu.

3. Wrap your component in Frame: When generating code for components, place them in a Figma frame with a gray background and 80-pixel padding. The AI will provide a component with better structure when it sees the component boundaries.

4. Image quality: If you use images, ensure they are of good quality before generating the code.

By following these guidelines, you can enhance the accuracy and usefulness of the generated React code.


---


You can test the plugin on five components/images for free. You will need to purchase credits to use it on more components. The plugin uses Anthropic’s Claude 3.5 Sonnet. Large-language models cost quite a bit of money to run. We must cover our costs to grow the plugin sustainably without compromising our service quality.

accepted.name: Matt Wierzbicki
accepted.description: Product designer and entrepreneur running multiple projects.

plugins.tagline: AI-Powered React Code Generation for Ant Design Components

plugins.name: Style Match
plugins.description:
Link matching styles of selected elements and the styles in your library


Work with all Figma style types: Fill, Stroke, Text, Effects, Layout grid



For example, a Color style named Primary with a color #0D99FF is in the library, this plugin will find and apply/link Primary to all elements with color #0D99FF, so you don't have to do it manually.


Use case

  1. When you pick a color using Eyedropper, you always get HEX color, even if the color is already in the library. Link it back to the matching style in the library.
  2. Retroactively apply design system to existing design.
  3. Unlink styles of external libraries when you copy elements from shared files, then relink them to your local library.


Limitations

  1. It only works with "Local styles", it doesn't work with Library or Variables for now.
  2. Component instances are skipped.
  3. Text styles are very tricky as any difference in line hight, letter spacing etc prevents it from been matched.
  4. Occasionally Figma returns linked style that doesn't exist to plugin, try "Unlink" first then "Apply" again.

accepted.description:

(dedicated profile for publishing)

plugins.name: Korean iOS Syst’em All
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically converts fonts in Text layers to Korean characters in Apple SD Gothic and English letters, numbers, and special characters in SF Pro, similar to the Korean iOS system fonts. It calculates and applies the corresponding values to maintain the same font weight. As of 2023, it uses the latest iOS font, SF Pro, and requires downloading and installing the font from Apple's official site for operation.

Additionally, SF Pro is configured to detect the font size and automatically apply the unique letter spacing values characteristic of iOS.

https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/typography#iOS-iPadOS-visionOS-tracking-values


-----


이 플러그인은 Text 레이어를 한국어 iOS시스템 폰트처럼 한글은 Apple SD Gothic으로, 영문, 숫자, 특수문자는 SF Pro로, 같은 두께에 해당하는 값을 자동으로 계산하여 변환해 줍니다. 2023년 기준 최신 iOS폰트인 SF Pro가 사용되며, 작동을 위해서는 애플 공식 사이트를 통한 폰트의 다운로드 및 설치가 필요합니다.


추가로, 이 때 SF Pro는 폰트의 사이즈를 감지하여 iOS에서의 고유한 자간값으로 자동 적용되도록 설정되어 있습니다.

https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/typography#iOS-iPadOS-visionOS-tracking-values

accepted.name: Heetaek Woo
accepted.description: Working at NAVER Corp.

plugins.tagline: Converts Figma Text layer fonts to a mix of Apple SD Gothic and SF Pro.

plugins.name: Feedback Flow
plugins.description:
English version is below.



🔌 どんなプラグイン？


Feedback Flowは、Figma上のコメントを確認しながらTODOリストを作成できるプラグインです。


複数人でデザイン作業を行っていると、コメントでやり取りをすることがあると思います。そしてコメントで依頼された修正を行うといったケースは誰しもが経験しているのではないでしょうか？

そんなときに、このプラグインを利用すれば、コメントからTODOを作成することができます。

まずはコメントからやらなくてはいけないTODOを書き起こして、TODOリストを見ながら修正を行っていくと、やらなくてはいけないことが漏れなくできるようになります。



🔧 使い方


コメントから「タスクに追加」を選択すると、そのコメントがタスクに追加されます。

タスクリストでは完了/未完了のステータス管理、順番の並べかえが可能です。



⏱️ こんなときにおすすめ


コメントを一覧形式で確認できます。一覧形式で確認できるのはこのプラグインだけです。

また、コメントからタスクを起こせます。


ぜひ、このプラグインを利用して作業効率を上げ、クリエイティブな作品を作り上げてください。

Feedback Flowは、デスクワークブランド「NERY」が提供するプラグイン#100シリーズの第六弾になります！



📝 プラグイン機能のご要望・ご意見をお聞かせください


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 NERYとは？


NERYは、FigmaとChromeのプラグインを開発・提供するデスクワークブランドです。



🚀 プラグイン#100シリーズとは？


プラグイン#100シリーズは、FigmaとGoogle Chromeのユーザー向けに、100個のプラグインをリリースするプロジェクトです。


このプロジェクトでは、クリエイターのニーズに応じたプラグインを開発し、デザイン作業をより便利かつ効率的に行えるようにサポートします。


プロジェクトは、企画から開発まですべてを行うのではなく、途中段階のものを皆様にお見せし、フィードバックをいただくことで、プラグインの機能拡充や新たな製品開発につなげます。


皆様の声がプラグインの開発に反映されることで、より使いやすく、より魅力的なFigmaとChromeを実現するために、皆様のご支援をお願いいたします。



🏢 開発会社


株式会社アジケ

https://ajike.co.jp/



===


🔌 What kind of plugin is it?


Feedback Flow is a plugin that allows you to create a to-do list while reviewing comments on Figma.


When working on design with multiple people, you might find yourself exchanging information through comments. I'm sure everyone has experienced scenarios where they've had to make adjustments requested in comments, haven't they?

In such situations, this plugin allows you to create to-dos from these comments.

First, write down the to-dos from the comments, then proceed with making the required adjustments while viewing the to-do list. This way, you can ensure that no tasks are overlooked.



🔧 How to use


When you select 'Add to Task' from a comment, that comment gets added to your tasks. Within the task list, you can manage the status of tasks as completed or incomplete, and you can rearrange the order of the tasks.



⏱️ Recommended for times like these


You can review comments in a list format, a feature unique to this plugin. Furthermore, you can create tasks from these comments.


Please take advantage of this plugin to improve your work efficiency and create creative pieces. Feedback Flow is the sixth installment in the Plugin #100 Series provided by the deskwork brand 'NERY'!



📝 Please give us your feedback on the plugin features.


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 What is NERY?


NERY is a deskwork brand that develops and provides plugins for Figma and Chrome.



🚀 What is the Plugin #100 Series?


The Plugin #100 Series is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.


In this project, we will develop plugins that meet the needs of creators and support them to make design work more convenient and efficient.


We will not perform all the planning and development of the project, but by showing you the intermediate stages and receiving feedback, we will continue to improve the functionality of the plugins and develop new products.


Your feedback will be reflected in the development of the plugin, so we ask for your support to realize a more user-friendly and attractive Figma and Chrome.



🏢 Developer


Ajike Co., Ltd.

https://ajike.co.jp/

58397.description:
English version is below.



🔌 どんなプラグイン？


Feedback Flowは、Figma上のコメントを確認しながらTODOリストを作成できるプラグインです。


複数人でデザイン作業を行っていると、コメントでやり取りをすることがあると思います。そしてコメントで依頼された修正を行うといったケースは誰しもが経験しているのではないでしょうか？

そんなときに、このプラグインを利用すれば、コメントからTODOを作成することができます。

まずはコメントからやらなくてはいけないTODOを書き起こして、TODOリストを見ながら修正を行っていくと、やらなくてはいけないことが漏れなくできるようになります。



🔧 使い方


コメントから「タスクに追加」を選択すると、そのコメントがタスクに追加されます。

タスクリストでは完了/未完了のステータス管理、順番の並べかえが可能です。



⏱️ こんなときにおすすめ


コメントを一覧形式で確認できます。一覧形式で確認できるのはこのプラグインだけです。

また、コメントからタスクを起こせます。


ぜひ、このプラグインを利用して作業効率を上げ、クリエイティブな作品を作り上げてください。

Feedback Flowは、デスクワークブランド「NERY」が提供するプラグイン#100シリーズの第六弾になります！



📝 プラグイン機能のご要望・ご意見をお聞かせください


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 NERYとは？


NERYは、FigmaとChromeのプラグインを開発・提供するデスクワークブランドです。



🚀 プラグイン#100シリーズとは？


プラグイン#100シリーズは、FigmaとGoogle Chromeのユーザー向けに、100個のプラグインをリリースするプロジェクトです。


このプロジェクトでは、クリエイターのニーズに応じたプラグインを開発し、デザイン作業をより便利かつ効率的に行えるようにサポートします。


プロジェクトは、企画から開発まですべてを行うのではなく、途中段階のものを皆様にお見せし、フィードバックをいただくことで、プラグインの機能拡充や新たな製品開発につなげます。


皆様の声がプラグインの開発に反映されることで、より使いやすく、より魅力的なFigmaとChromeを実現するために、皆様のご支援をお願いいたします。



🏢 開発会社


株式会社アジケ
